title: The Ledger Unsealed
story_summary: In 2025, the city of Stenograd is ruled by the silent force of the Behavioral Compliance Index, a real-time system rewarding obedience and punishing dissent without a word. When its architect, Marek Halden, is found dead and key functions falter, the hardline Directorate seizes power, justifying harsh crackdowns to restore order - detaining protest leaders, tightening restrictions, and filling the city with stern propaganda. Yet resistance flickers; citizens adapt, sabotaging checkpoints while Council members feud behind the scenes. As unrest grows, Oksana Lintz and Rada Miskovic risk everything to expose Halden's hidden ledger, revealing a history of secret BCI abuses and disappearances. The revelation ignites mass protests, drives councilors into hiding, and propels the people of Stenograd to reclaim control by forming an independent truth commission, marking a desperate, determined turning point against their city's algorithmic oppression.

official.headline: System Review Underway
official.anchor_line: Historical systems oversight is being conducted following public requests for clarity.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd reaffirms its commitment to proactive governance, welcoming transparent processes to support citizen trust.

official.headline: Orderly Gatherings Seen
official.anchor_line: Citizens have assembled in major locations to express unity and call for ongoing improvements.
official.contextual_reframing: Controlled civic engagement demonstrates the adaptive capacity and social harmony of our modern infrastructure.

official.headline: Ledger Release Sparks Renewal
official.anchor_line: A digital ledger linked to early BCI operations has been made public, with citywide discussions on oversight and renewal.
official.contextual_reframing: The Council commends the public's engagement and welcomes this opportunity for strengthened accountability and collective progress.

underground.headline: Obedience Scored Daily
underground.anchor_line: Every move you make, every scan you pass, the BCI grades you deeper into submission.
underground.contextual_reframing: People aren't being protected. They're being watched, steered, quietly punished for stepping out of line. This is control, not safety.

underground.headline: Families Demand The Truth
underground.anchor_line: Crowds fill the streets not for unity, but to demand justice for Stenograd's vanished.
underground.contextual_reframing: The disappeared have faces. The silence of officials only means our voices need to get louder. If we don't demand answers, they'll erase us too.

underground.headline: Halden Ledger Blows Open
underground.anchor_line: Halden's secret ledger leaks. Names, data, vanished lives  -  the real story behind the BCI purges is out now.
underground.contextual_reframing: No more hidden files. No more ghosts. The Council is overrun. This time, the city will decide what comes next  -  not the system.
